title: The Devasena Bangles: Diamond-Studded Elegance
materials: adorned with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. The gold is meticulously crafted with a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: These bangles feature a unique scalloped design, interspersed with sparkling CZ stones set in a prong setting. The intricate gold work exhibits a contemporary twist on traditional bangle styles.
colors: Warm yellow gold contrasted by the dazzling white of the CZ stones.
occasions: or Diwali. Can also be paired with traditional attire for a vibrant look at weddings and celebrations (Pendli and Shubhakaryalu).
description: These bangles offer a blend of classic design and modern appeal. The high-quality 22K gold and brilliant CZ stones ensure lasting beauty and sparkle. These are lightweight and ideal for everyday wear, making them a valuable addition to your jewelry collection.
